it"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h6"}},{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.text3","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text3","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Watches & Wearables"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}},{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.text4","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text4","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Titan’s genesis lies in the watch products division. It has gone from strength to strength and collection to collection through the years in the watches category.

The division continues to add world-class brands to the company's portfolio, with an ever-expanding setup and capacity. It has over 4000 employees spread over 3 business units in Bangalore, India; a manufacturing unit at Hosur and 3 assembly plants located in the north of India. This division has placed Titan Company among the world's largest retail networks and earned the company the place of fifth largest integrated watch manufacturer in the world.

‘Engineering meets Evolution’ at Titan Smart Labs, a dedicated engineering centre in Hyderabad that was started with the intention to create inventive and diversified products to meet consumer expectations.

"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}}]}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.container6","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container6","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":null,"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.container5","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container5","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":null,"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.container4","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container4","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.text5","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text5 majestic testament to the game of Chess, Titan’s Grandmaster Collection is inspired by the game’s traditions and timeless aesthetic. Multiple facets of the game find expression in the design, be it the strategic moves or the very essence of timekeeping."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}},{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.layoutGrid3$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.staticImage4","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage4","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$_3.png?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}},{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.text9","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text9","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Maritime"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h2"}},{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.text10","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text10","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"The collection draws inspiration from the voyage of progress and is imprinted with defining elements from the trans-oceanic travel era like the propeller, the porthole, the dynamic bow among others. The colour-gradients add to the serenity & mysteriousness of the sea."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}},{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.layoutGrid3$row0$column2","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.staticImage5","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage5","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$_4.png?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}},{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.text11","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text11","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Quartet"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h2"}},{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.text12","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text12","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"In the enchanting "Quartet" collection of timepieces, music's allure meets timeless elegance. Serenity and elegance blend through captivating color gradients, evoking the infinite depths of the world of music."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}}]}}]}},{"$widgetId":"30.S.WatchesDivision.layoutGrid4","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid4 mx-layoutgrid
